## Help! {.help}

`r htmltools::includeCSS("./slide.css")`

<div id = "help-left" class = "build">

<div>
<p class = "help-left-text">Most R functions come packaged with robust documentation, which you can access by using the <code>help()</code> function:</p>

```{r, eval=FALSE}
# pull up help page for the mean function
help(mean)
```
</div>

<div>
<p class = "help-left-text">Also find terrific community help online:</p>

<a class = "help-left-link" href="https://www.google.com">Google</a>

<a class = "help-left-link" href="https://www.github.com">GitHub</a>

<a class = "help-left-link" href="https://www.stackoverflow.com">StackOverflow</a>

</div>
</div>
